diseases.name: Gestational Cholestasis
diseases.symptoms: Itchy skin, particularly on the hands and feet
diseases.treatments: Monitoring, medications to reduce bile acids
symptoms_list: particularly on the hands and feet

diseases.name: Injury to Internal Organ
diseases.treatments: Immediate medical attention, diagnostic tests, surgery (in some cases)

diseases.name: Scabies
diseases.symptoms: Intense itching, especially at night, small blisters or bumps
diseases.treatments: Prescription medications (topical or oral scabicides), washing clothes and bedding in hot water, vacuuming and cleaning home
treatments_list: washing clothes and bedding in hot water

diseases.name: Congenital Glaucoma
diseases.symptoms: Cloudy or hazy eyes, excessive tearing, sensitivity to light
diseases.treatments: Surgery (e.g., trabeculotomy, goniotomy) to create a new drainage pathway, medications to reduce intraocular pressure
treatments_list: Surgery (e.g., trabeculotomy, goniotomy) to create a new drainage pathway
